data_table.description: This sample attributes table includes sample IDs, body site where sample was collected, analyte type, tumor status, histological type, sequencing type, and sequencing center.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: SEQUENCING_TYPE
variable.value: whole sequencing of RNA at low molecular weight

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing
